instruction: List three reasons why free trade is beneficial
output:
1. Free trade promotes economic growth and mutual development by allowing countries to specialize in the areas in which they are most competitive and efficient. 
2. Free trade also has potential to reduce poverty, as countries can access new markets and better prices for their goods and services. 
3. Free trade encourages collaboration and improves relations between countries, as it makes them more interdependent and encourages dialogue.
